title: Why Fresh-Ground Beats Pre-Ground
description: A fast breakdown of Why Fresh-Ground Beats Pre-Ground for builders.

hook.text: A jar of pre-ground pepper loses half its flavor within weeks. Whole peppercorns keep for years.

buildup.text: Grinding shatters cell walls, exposing volatile oils to air. Oxidation degrades them rapidly.

quiz.question: Why do whole spices retain flavor longer than pre-ground?
